fr:title.text: Variance typing system for HOL^{ex} formulae

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Variance typing system for \mu HOL^{ex} formulae

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The syntax of \mu HOL^{ex} formulae has a small logical fragment, extended with a fixed-point operator, variance annotations and contraints for ordinal variables. v ranges over variance annotations, and P, T range over predicate and non-predicate domains respectively. t ::=\ x\ |\ \forall (x : T).t\ |\ t \Rightarrow t^\prime \ |\ \lambda (x^v : T).t\ |\ t\ t^\prime \ |\ \mu ^\alpha (x:P).t\ |\ \exists \alpha .t\ |\ \beta < \alpha
